Package hjb.msg

Provides the interface and classes used to allow data to be transferred between HJBMessage and Message instances.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AttributeCopierAssistant.ReaderWriter ReaderWriter specifies methods for reading/updating an attribute value of a JMS Message.
MessageCopier MessageCopier defines the methods used to convert between HJBMessage and JMS Messages.
 

Class Summary
AttributeCopier AttributeCopier is used to convert headers in HJBMessages to the various attribute values on Messages and vice versa.
AttributeCopierAssistant AttributeCopierAssistant is to used convert values that are attributes of the JMS Message to encoded HJB values and vice versa.
AttributeCopierAssistant.BaseReaderWriter BaseReaderWriter provides methods that implement behavior used by the ReaderWriters in the hjb.msg package.
BytesMessageCopier BytesMessageCopier is the MessageCopier for BytesMessages.
HJBMessage HJBMessage serves as an intermediate representation of a JMS message.
MapMessageCopier MapMessageCopieris the MessageCopier for MapMessages.
MessageCopierFactory MessageCopierFactory determines the MessageCopier to be used to copy between specific instances of Messages and HJBMessages.
NamedPropertyCopier NamePropertyCopier is used to convert headers in HJBMessages to the various named properties on a Messages and vice versa.
ObjectMessageCopier ObjectMessageCopier is the MessageCopier for ObjectMessages.
PayloadMessageCopier  
StreamMessageCopier StreamMessageCopier is the MessageCopier for StreamMessages.
TextMessageCopier TextMessageCopier is the MessageCopier for TextMessages.
 

Package hjb.msg Description

Provides the interface and classes used to allow data to be transferred between HJBMessage and Message instances.

MessageCopier defines the methods used to copy data between the HJB and JMS versions of a message. The package contains implementations of this interface for each of the JMS Message types, all which extend a base class, PayloadMessageCopier which defines utility methods used by all the implementations.

MessageCopierFactory is used to instantiate the appropriate MessageCopier for a given message.

AttributeCopier, AttributeCopierAssistant and NamedProperyCopier are used by the implementations of MessageCopier to copy the attributes and properties between the two versions of a message.
